Translations.Text: qasam hai suraj ki aur us ki dhoop ki
qasam hai chaandh ki jab us ke piche aaye
qasam hai din ki jab suraj ko numaaya kare
qasam hai raath ki jab ose dhaanp le
qasam hai asmaan ki aur us ke banaane ki
qasam hai zameen ki aur ose hamwaar karne ki
qasam hai nafs ki aur ose durusth banaane ki
phir samajh di us ko badh kaari ki aur bach kar chalne ki
jis ne ose paak kiya wo kamyaab hoa
aur jis ne ose qaaq mein mila diya wo na kaam hoa
(khaum) samoodh ne apni sarkashi ke baayes jhutlaaya
jab un mein ka bada badh baqth uth khada hoa
unhe Allah ke rasool ne farma diya tha ke Allah taâ€™ala ki oontni aur us ke pine ki baari ki (hifaazath karo)

un logo ne apne paighambar ko jhota samajh kar us oontni ki koonche kaat di, pas un ke rab ne un ke gunaaho ke baayes, un par halaakath daali aur phir halaakath ko aam kar diya aur us basti ko baraabar kar diya
wo nahi darta, us ke tabaah kun anjaam se
qasam hai raath ki jab chaa jaaye
aur qasam hai din ki jab roushan ho
aur qasam hai us zaath ki jis ne nar wa maada ko paida kiya
yaqinan tumhaari koshish muqtalif qism ki hai
jis ne diya (Allah ki raah mein) aur dara (apne rab se)
aur nek baath ki tasdeeq karta rahega
to hum bhi us ko asaan raaste ki sahulath denge
lekin jis ne baqili ki aur be parvaahi barti
aur nek baath ki takzeeb ki
to hum bhi us ki tangi aur mushkil ke samaan mayassar kar denge
us ka maal ose (aundha) girne ke waqth kuch kaam na ayega
beshak raah dikha dena, hamaare zimme hai
aur hamaare hee haath aaqirath aur dunya hai
main ne tumhe shole maarti hoyi aag se dara diya hai
